page.title: 17Piers Chappell
page.content: Piers Chappell was born on the 7th June 1975.He moved to Great Barford when he was two and started to develop pains in his stomach when he was four. It was cancer.Throughout his illness he showed great courage and spirit.He died on the 12th January 1985. At his funeral were many of his school friends,teachers and his doctor. Perhaps the most moving moment was when his favourite music,"Chariots of Fire"was played. The vicar,a friend of Piers,said at the funeral,"For his immense courage and undying spirit,he will live in our hearts for ever." At the present time,pupils at Alban School have raised about Â£4000 for a National Childrens Cancer Research Fund in his memory.
